title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, December 29, 2019
description: Today is the 60th birthday of  Paula Poundstone, who said, "Adults are always asking little kids what they want to be when they grow up 'cause they're looking for ideas."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the 60th birthday of  Paula Poundstone, who said, "Adults are always asking little kids what they want to be when they grow up 'cause they're looking for ideas."
